title: svAmi nI (padavarNam)
sahitya:
svAmi nI manam irangi aruL tA mA dayai nidhiyE muruga guha
pUmEl vaazhvE vEmbena ninaindhaaL
pUvai manam nondAL nI 


anupallavi

  tAmadam sheidAl manam varunda nErumE manamoDindu mA mayal veyil
 puzhuvAit-tuDittAL tiru-mAl marugA SaNmukhA parivuDanE
 
(citta svara sAhityam)
vA vA vikasita punita mayilin misai vA vA varadanE pada darishanam tara
dEva kunjariyuDan kura magaLum shIruDanE maruvum sukumAranE 
 


caraNam    vAta nOi koNDALa viraindu marundu tA ivaL perum piDi 
1:  mAdumai maghanE dayAkaranE kanavilum unnai nambi 
 caraNam 2    mAdhavan malark-kaNNaN mAl maruganE inda pEdai nidam
Arumukham Arumukham enrurugi 
 caraNam 4    unadu ninaivil anai tandaiyai manaiyai
 viLaiyADalai pADalai maranduDal taLarndu ov- 
 caraNam 5    yArumil taniyiDam tanil kaNNIr vazhindiDum vizhiyuDan
shiridum irangavillai pArAmukhamuDan iniyum nI ivaLai parishOdanai sheidAl
dharmamO varmamO uyarndadOr mantram surar ulaga marundu
naya bhayamoDu tantram purindadilum guNam shiridum illai sarasa
